creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: four lines of curling, sinuous calligraphy; light grey-blue mount with tan border
inscription:
Signature and Seals

See notes for translation
markings: LLQ, square intaglio: [ 鵬斎狂叟 ] {Bōsai kyōshū} (Crazy old man Bōsai); LLQ, square relief: : [ 犬平醉氏 ] {Inudaira yoishi } (the drunkard of Inudaira); URC, rectangular intaglio:  [ 天許閒人] { Tenkyo kanjin} (the man permitted leisure by heaven)
signed: LLC: [  鵬斎老人書] (Bōsai rōjin sho)
title: Growing Old
